meanings.definition: Extending or going across a continent.
meanings.sent1: The transcontinental railroad connected the east and west coasts of the country.
meanings.sent2: She took a transcontinental flight from New York to Los Angeles.
meanings.sent3: The transcontinental journey by train was long but exciting.
meanings.sent4: Their transcontinental friendship knew no boundaries.
meanings.sent5: The transcontinental highway offered breathtaking views of the landscape.

meanings.definition: Relating to or involving travel or communication across a continent.
meanings.sent1: The transcontinental phone call connected people from different sides of the continent.
meanings.sent2: They planned a transcontinental road trip to explore the diverse regions.
meanings.sent3: The transcontinental email exchange was filled with interesting stories.
meanings.sent4: Their transcontinental relationship blossomed through letters and calls.
meanings.sent5: The transcontinental internet cable facilitated fast communication between continents.
